description:
Captain Vander Decken and Hordy Jones manage to successfully breach the defenses of Ryugu Palace. Meanwhile, Jimbei waits patiently for Luffy to arrive at the Sea Forest.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hody Shuurai: Fukushuu Keikaku no Hajimari
Hody passe à l`attaque ! Le début de la vengeance
Hordy`s Onslaught! The Retaliatory Plan Set into Motion!
La invasión de Hody. Comienza el plan de venganza
قصر ريوغو في صدمة! اختطاف شيراهوشي!
ホーディ襲来 復讐計画の始まり
